bug.author: janeczek2
bug.summary: [Feature] Output audio has cut off 12 kHz and higer frequencies
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Created output file has higer frequencies cut off at around 12 kHz. Can spleeter be configured to higher the cutoff at 20 kHz? <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Installed using conda Running as it it should, no errors. Got output file has frequency spectrum cut off at around 12 kHz.
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
INFO:spleeter:File output\pisarzflac\accompaniment.wav written INFO:spleeter:File output\pisarzflac\vocals.wav written <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows 7 x64
Installation type Conda
RAM available XGo 16GB
Hardware spec / CPU i7 4790
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
